sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Download, Eye, FileText, Mail, Phone, MapPin, ExternalLink, Award, Briefcase, GraduationCap, Code } from 'lucide-react'; const Resume = () => { const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState('preview'); // 'preview' or 'pdf' const personalInfo = { name: 'Gabriel Smith', title: 'Systems Developer & Computer Science Student', email: 'gabrielsmith1874@gmail.com', phone: '+1 (289) 681-0442', location: 'Mississauga, Ontario, Canada', linkedin: 'linkedin.com/in/gabriel-smith-b3b366253', github: 'github.com/gabrielsmith1874', website: 'gabrielsmith.site' }; const skills = { programming: ['Python', 'Java', 'C', 'C#', 'JavaScript', 'HTML', 'CSS'], ai_ml: ['Machine Learning', 'Artificial Intelligence', 'Algorithms', 'Data Structures'], data_science: ['SQL', 'R', 'Statistics', 'Hypothesis Testing'], other: ['Object-Oriented Programming', 'Algorithm Design', 'Time/Correctness Analysis', 'Assembly'] }; const experience = [ { title: 'Junior Developer', company: 'Ontario Financing Authority', period: '2024 - Present', location: 'Ontario, Canada', description: 'Developing and maintaining financial applications using modern web technologies and best practices.', achievements: [ 'Built responsive web applications for financial data management', 'Implemented secure authentication and authorization systems', 'Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies', 'Optimized application performance and user experience' ], technologies: ['React', 'JavaScript', 'CSS', 'HTML', 'Git'] } ]; const education = [ { degree: 'Bachelor of Science in Computer Science', institution: 'University of Toronto', period: '2021 - 2025 (Expected)', location: 'Toronto, ON', gpa: '3.8/4.0', relevantCoursework: [ 'Data Structures and Algorithms', 'Artificial Intelligence', 'Machine Learning', 'Software Engineering', 'Computer Networks', 'Database Systems', 'Operating Systems' ] } ]; const projects = [ { name: 'Stroku', description: 'Innovative web application showcasing modern development practices', technologies: ['React', 'JavaScript', 'CSS3', 'HTML5'], impact: 'Live demo available at stroku.netlify.app', url: 'https://stroku.netlify.app/' }, { name: 'Battleship Solitaire AI', description: 'AI-powered puzzle solver using advanced algorithms', technologies: ['Python', 'AI/ML', 'Algorithms'], impact: 'Demonstrated advanced problem-solving and AI implementation skills', url: 'https://github.com/gabrielsmith1874/My-Projects/tree/main/Battleship%20Solitaire' }, { name: 'Checkers AI', description: 'Intelligent Checkers game with AI opponent', technologies: ['Python', 'AI/ML', 'Game Development'], impact: 'Showcased game AI development and strategy implementation', url: 'https://github.com/gabrielsmith1874/My-Projects/tree/main/Checkers%20AI' }, { name: 'Adventure Game', description: 'Interactive text-based adventure game', technologies: ['Python', 'Game Development', 'Object-Oriented Programming'], impact: 'Demonstrated software design patterns and game development skills', url: 'https://github.com/gabrielsmith1874/My-Projects/tree/main/Adventure%20Game' }, { name: 'Huffman Compression', description: 'Data compression implementation using Huffman coding', technologies: ['Python', 'Data Structures', 'Algorithms'], impact: 'Showcased understanding of compression algorithms and data structures', url: 'https://github.com/gabrielsmith1874/My-Projects/tree/main/huffman' } ]; const certifications = [ 'AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner', 'Google Cloud Professional Developer', 'Microsoft Azure Fundamentals', 'Certified Kubernetes Administrator' ]; const renderPreview = () => (
{/* Header */}

{personalInfo.name}

{personalInfo.title}

{personalInfo.email}
{personalInfo.phone}
{personalInfo.location}
{/* Skills */}

Technical Skills

Programming Languages

{skills.programming.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}

Frameworks & Libraries

{skills.frameworks.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}

Tools & Technologies

{skills.tools.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}

Languages

{skills.languages.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Experience */}

Experience

{experience.map((job, index) => (

{job.title}

{job.company}

{job.period}

{job.location}

{job.description}

    {job.achievements.map((achievement, i) => (
  • {achievement}
    • ))}
{job.technologies.map((tech) => ( {tech} ))}
))}
{/* Education */}

Education

{education.map((edu, index) => (

{edu.degree}

{edu.institution}

{edu.period}

GPA: {edu.gpa}

{edu.location}

Relevant Coursework:

{edu.relevantCoursework.map((course) => ( {course} ))}
))}
{/* Projects */}

Key Projects

{projects.map((project, index) => (

{project.name}

{project.description}

{project.impact}

{project.technologies.map((tech) => ( {tech} ))}
))}
{/* Certifications */}

Certifications

{certifications.map((cert, index) => (
{cert}
))}
); const renderPDF = () => (

PDF Resume

Click the download button to get the full PDF version of my resume.

); return (
{/* Header */}

My Resume

Download my resume or view it online. I'm always excited to discuss new opportunities and collaborate on innovative projects.

{/* View Mode Toggle */}
{/* Resume Content */} {viewMode === 'preview' ? renderPreview() : renderPDF()} {/* Action Buttons */}
{/* Contact Information */}

Let's Connect

Email

{personalInfo.email}

Phone

{personalInfo.phone}

Location

{personalInfo.location}
); }; export default Resume;
